Krista Chan (she/her)

Hi, I'm Krista! I'm a data scientist at the US Census Bureau.

Blog About

About

I am a recent grad of the University of Chicago’s MS in Computational Analysis and Public Policy and now work as a data scientist at the US Census Bureau. Prior to graduate school, I was a research assistant at the UCSF Institute for Health Policy Studies and worked on healthcare analytics for The Chartis Group.

Outside of work, I have enjoyed mentoring youth with the Center for Empowering Refugees and Immigrants (CERI) and Chinese Mutual Aid Association. I also look for opportunities to contribute to civic tech projects that I find interesting.
